{"id":388707235,"question_id":8,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â years, 5Â months","timestamp":1598834046,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/388707235/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int myAtoi(string str) {\n\t\tdouble res = 0;\n\t\tint start = 0;\n\t\tbool pos = true;\n\t\tif(str.length() == 0) \n            return 0;\n\t\twhile(str[start] == ' ') {\n\t\t\tstart++;\n\t\t};\n\t\tif(str[start] == '+') {\n\t\t\tpos = true;\n\t\t\tstart++;\n\t\t} else if(str[start] == '-') {\n\t\t\tpos = false;\n\t\t\tstart++;\n\t\t} else if(!(str[start] >= '0' && str[start] <= '9')) {\n\t\t\treturn 0;\n\t\t};\n\t\t\n\t\twhile (start < str.length()) {\n\t\t\tif (str[start] >= '0' && str[start] <= '9') {\n\t\t\t\tres = res * 10 + str[start]-'0';\n\t\t\t\tstart++;\n\t\t\t} else \n\t\t\t\tbreak;\n\t\t};\n\t\t\t\n        if (pos) {\n            if (res >INT_MAX) \n                return INT_MAX;\n            else \n                return int(res);\n        } else {\n            res = 0 - res;\n            if (res <INT_MIN) \n                return INT_MIN;\n            else \n                return int(res);            \n        }\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
